properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Improper disposal of household waste - Ambewela
properties.Recommended water quality improvement me:
Preparing a separate place in home gardens for disposing household waste
Awareness programme on how to disposal household waste properly and converting them to usable products such as compost
Facilitating garbage collection
